Description: We encourage all brothers, sisters, and families to attend and benefit from these lectures, as they cover important topics essential for our education.
join us for our Friday halaqah, we look forward to seeing you all إن شاء الله !!
Women and Children only. Boys under 10.

Join us for a special Monthly Mocha dedicated to Mental Health Awareness. 

Enjoy a warm cup of coffee while engaging in meaningful conversations about mental well-being.
Join us for a beautiful evening filled with duff entertainment, knowledge-based fun quizzes, face painting, a bouncy castle, and a delightful meal.
